Hair problems? We know your pain.‚Ä®
text.text: Hair problems? We know your pain.‚Ä®

text.html:
These issues don't just affect your appearance; they take a toll on your confidence and self-esteem.

Each day becomes a struggle as you try to manage your hair, feeling helpless and in pain.

You miss feeling beautiful and feminine, like the version of yourself you used to be. You've lost confidence and find yourself avoiding social situations because of your hair.
text.text:
These issues don't just affect your appearance; they take a toll on your confidence and self-esteem.

Each day becomes a struggle as you try to manage your hair, feeling helpless and in pain. 

You miss feeling beautiful and feminine, like the version of yourself you used to be. You've lost confidence and find yourself avoiding social situations because of your hair.

text.html: It's true!‚Ä® There are so many factors that affect your hair health.
text.text: It's true!‚Ä® There are so many factors that affect your hair health.

text.html: Nutrition
Eating foods which are not rich in protein, vitamins and minerals blocks hair growth.
text.text: Eating foods which are not rich in protein, vitamins and minerals blocks hair growth.

text.html: Metabolism
Slow metabolism can result in your hair becoming dry, brittle, coarse and even break off.
text.text: Slow metabolism can result in your hair becoming dry, brittle, coarse and even break off.

text.html: Hormones
DHT hormone attacks your hair follicle thereby causing hair thinning and hair fall.
text.text: DHT hormone attacks your hair follicle thereby causing hair thinning and hair fall.

text.html: Stress
Increased cortisol levels disrupts your hair cycle causing hair loss.
text.text: Increased cortisol levels disrupts your hair cycle causing hair loss.

text.html: Environment
Sweat, heat, dust and pollution can lead to poor health of the hair follicle and eventual hair damage.
text.text: Sweat, heat, dust and pollution can lead to poor health of the hair follicle and eventual hair damage.

text.html: One-size-fits-all solutions simply won‚Äôt address them all.
text.text: One-size-fits-all solutions simply won‚Äôt address them all.

text.html: If you want to solve your hair issues, you need to LEARN how to take care of your hair.
text.text: If you want to solve your hair issues, you need to LEARN how to take care of your hair.

Create a personalised routine to reduce hair loss and achieve healthier hair.

text.html: But... what is the 14 Day Haircare Challenge exactly?
text.text: But... what is the 14 Day Haircare Challenge exactly?

text.html: Is it a haircare product?!

Yes... and no. After 14 days, you'll walk away with your own luxury DIY shampoo. But instead of buying a product from a store, you‚Äôll be making with natural and common ingredients you can find in your kitchen. The best part? It‚Äôs affordable, natural and made by you, for you.
text.text: Yes... and no. After 14 days, you'll walk away with your own luxury DIY shampoo. But instead of buying a product from a store, you‚Äôll be making with natural and common ingredients you can find in your kitchen. The best part? It‚Äôs affordable, natural and made by you, for you.

text.html: Ist it an online program?

Yep! All participants will join our online haircare community and take the challenge together! (Or you can go at your own pace if you prefer that). Each daily haircare challenge comes with an easy-to-follow video with step-by-step instructions showing you how to get healthier hair with 5 minutes of your time.

DON't WAIT
Your hair needs you now.

Beauty marketing wants us to believe that we can 'repair' our hair with products, but the ugly truth is that hair damage is irreversible. The more you wait, the harder it becomes to get the results you want.
text.text: Beauty marketing wants us to believe that we can 'repair' our hair with products, but the ugly truth is that hair damage is irreversible. The more you wait, the harder it becomes to get the results you want.

text.html: Hair damage is irreversible.

As we age, our bodies get less and less efficient at repairing the damage... Today's year old is better than tomorrow's years old.
